short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The world’s smartest multi-protocol wallet—the all-in-one solution to handle all your Bitcoin tokens and assets.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Your all-in-one, cutting-edge solution for managing Bitcoin tokens and assets! 

Manage, Inscribe, Send, Receive, Mint and Deploy:
☑️ Ordinals, BRC-20, Bitmaps, TAP, DMT and UNATs
☑️ SRC-20 and Stamps
☑️ Lambda LRC-20
☑️ Runes
☑️ Atomicals ARC-20
☑️ Fractal Ordinals, Runes and CAT-20

For more detailed information on features and updates, visit our website: https://tapwallet.io
